description:
Wakamatsu Masato is the main male character in the series. Has a crush on Kashima Miyuki, his classmate, but constantly gets into trouble and misunderstandings with her. Lives alone with his sister Miyuki in the same house, and is constantly plagued by feelings of attraction to her. He knows that they are not related by blood, but keeps it a secret for Miyuki`s sake.
Source: AdachiFan
name: Wakamatsu Masato
